cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, 20tli June 1917.(Received at India Office 11.15 p.m.)9079. Mahsud operations. On 17th, force concentrated at Haidari Kachafter completing camel road through Shahur and Tangi without oppositionexcept few shots. On 18th, one brigade and Sarwakai column engaged inpunitive measures met no opposition, reconnaissance of hills east of Barwandmet slight opposition. Our casualties 2 Indian .ranks wounded. ReportedMahsuds intend fighting and that inhabitants of Khaisara are assembling forthat purpose at Barwand.
